# Construction of TPOF Walkway/Pathway to Upper Terrace

## Tender Details

* [Reference Number: PW-22-01004439](#reference-number-pw-22-01004439)
* [Solicitation Number: 202206291](#solicitation-number-202206291)
* [Tender Closing Date: Friday, 2022-09-02 14:00:00](#tender-closing-date)
* [Contact Information](#contact-information)

## Background

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) intends to retain a contractor to provide construction services for a new walkway/pathway to the Upper Terrace at 1426 St. Joseph Blvd, Ottawa, Ontario. The contractor will be responsible for designing, procuring, and installing the walkway/pathway to meet the requirements of the RCMP.

## Mandatory Requirements

* Mandatory bid forms, special instructions, and amendments must be obtained from the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) prior to the bid closing date.
* All submissions must be in English or French.
* Firms intending to submit bids must obtain bid documents through the GETS service provider on the Government of Canada Web site at [http://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders](http://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tenders).
* Failure to comply with mandatory requirements may result in rejection of your bid.
